trans-unit.source: .NET Core Prerequisites (Preview 3 Tooling)
trans-unit.target: Requisitos previos de .NET Core (herramientas de Preview 3)

trans-unit.source: .NET Core Prerequisites (Preview 3 Tooling)
trans-unit.target: Requisitos previos de .NET Core (herramientas de Preview 3)

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites for Windows development (Preview 3 Tooling)
trans-unit.target: Requisitos previos para el desarrollo de Windows (herramientas de Preview 3)

trans-unit.source: .NET Core development on Windows with Visual Studio requires:
trans-unit.target: Se requiere el desarrollo de .NET Core en Windows con Visual Studio:

trans-unit.source: A supported version of the Windows client or operating system.
trans-unit.target: Una versión compatible del cliente o sistema operativo Windows.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2017 RC or later
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2017 RC o posterior

trans-unit.source: .NET Core Tooling Preview 3
trans-unit.target: .NET Core Tooling Preview 3

trans-unit.source: Supported Windows versions
trans-unit.target: Versiones admitidas de Windows

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is supported by the following versions of Windows:
trans-unit.target: .NET Core es compatible con las siguientes versiones de Windows:

trans-unit.source: Windows 7 SP1
trans-unit.target: Windows 7 SP1

trans-unit.source: Windows 8.1
trans-unit.target: Windows 8.1

trans-unit.source: Windows 10
trans-unit.target: Windows 10

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 (Full Server or Server Core)
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 (Servidor completo o Server Core)

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 SP1 (Full Server or Server Core)
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 SP1 (Servidor completo o Server Core)

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 R2 SP1 (Full Server or Server Core)
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 R2 SP1 (Servidor completo o Server Core)

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2016 (Full Server, Server Core or Nano Server)
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2016 (Servidor completo, Server Core o Nano Server)

trans-unit.source: You can see the full set of [supported operating systems](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/1.0/1.0.0.md#rtm-platform-support) in the [.NET Core Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/1.0/1.0.0.md).
trans-unit.target: Puede ver el conjunto completo de [sistemas operativos compatibles](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/1.0/1.0.0.md#rtm-platform-support) en las [notas de la versión de .NET Core](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/1.0/1.0.0.md).

trans-unit.source: .NET Core dependencies
trans-unit.target: Dependencias de .NET Core

trans-unit.source: .NET Core requires the VC++ Redistributable when running on Windows.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core requiere VC++ Redistributable cuando se ejecuta en Windows.

trans-unit.source: It is installed for you by the .NET Core installer.
trans-unit.target: Lo instala automáticamente el instalador de .NET Core.

trans-unit.source: You need to install the Visual C++ redistributable manually if you are installing .NET Core via the installer script (`dotnet-install.ps1`).
trans-unit.target: Debe instalar manualmente Visual C++ Redistributable si instala .NET Core a través del script del instalador (`dotnet-install.ps1`).

trans-unit.source: The Visual C++ Redistributable version differs by Windows version.
trans-unit.target: La versión de Visual C++ Reditributable varía según la versión de Windows.

trans-unit.source: Windows 10
trans-unit.target: Windows 10

trans-unit.source: [Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2015](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48145)
trans-unit.target: [Visual C++ Redistributable para Visual Studio 2015](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48145)

trans-unit.source: Windows 7+ (not Windows 10)
trans-unit.target: Windows 7+ (no Windows 10)

trans-unit.source: Please make sure that your Windows installation is up-to-date and includes hotfix [KB2533623](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/2533623) installed through Windows Update.
trans-unit.target: Asegúrese de que la instalación de Windows está actualizada y que incluye la revisión [KB2533623](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/2533623) instalada a través de Windows Update.

trans-unit.source: [Universal CRT update](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48234) (you can get more info on what Universal CRT is in [this blog post](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/vcblog/2015/03/03/introducing-the-universal-crt/))
trans-unit.target: [Actualización de Universal CRT](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48234) (puede obtener más información sobre las novedades de CRT Universal en [esta entrada de blog](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/vcblog/2015/03/03/introducing-the-universal-crt/))

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: You may develop .NET Core apps with any editor using the .NET Core command-line tools, but if you want to use Visual Studio and the Preview 3 of the .NET Core tooling, you need Visual Studio 2017 RC or later.
trans-unit.target: Puede desarrollar aplicaciones .NET Core con cualquier editor mediante las herramientas de la línea de comandos de .NET Core; pero, si quiere usar Visual Studio y Preview 3 de las herramientas de .NET Core, necesitará Visual Studio 2017 RC o posterior.

trans-unit.source: You can download [Visual Studio Community 2017 RC](https://www.visualstudio.com/vs/visual-studio-2017-rc/) for free.
trans-unit.target: Puede descargar [Visual Studio Community 2017 RC](https://www.visualstudio.com/vs/visual-studio-2017-rc/) de manera gratuita.

trans-unit.source: Verify that you're running Visual Studio 2017 RC:
trans-unit.target: Compruebe que ejecuta Visual Studio 2017 RC:

trans-unit.source: On the **Help** menu, choose **About Microsoft Visual Studio**.
trans-unit.target: En el menú **Ayuda**, elija **Acerca de Microsoft Visual Studio**.

trans-unit.source: In the **About Microsoft Visual Studio** dialog, the version number should be 15.0.25831.1 or higher.
trans-unit.target: En el cuadro de diálogo **Acerca de Microsoft Visual Studio**, el número de versión debe ser 15.0.25831.1 o posterior.

trans-unit.source: You can read more about the changes in Visual Studio 2017 RC in the [release notes](https://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/news/releasenotes/vs2017-relnotes).
trans-unit.target: Puede leer más acerca de los cambios en Visual Studio 2017 RC en las [notas de la versión](https://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/news/releasenotes/vs2017-relnotes).

trans-unit.source: Make sure you installed the ".NET Core and Docker (Preview)" workload during setup.
trans-unit.target: Asegúrese de que instala la carga de trabajo ".NET Core y Docker (versión preliminar)" durante la instalación.

trans-unit.source: If you didn't, it's possible to run the setup again and select it.
trans-unit.target: Si no lo ha hecho, puede volver a ejecutar el programa de instalación y seleccionarla.
